Articles.Content:
Hello there ! I play KSP since 0.20 after I tried the demo and the same day bought the game. No need to say that I really really enjoy this game, keep up the good works devs !

I have been browsing the forum for a while now and learned a lot from all the post i read and I finally decided to register. I thought I would join the community after all those hours spent here.

Oh and I'm very bad when it come to introduce myself.

And.. English is not my first language so if I make mistakes don't hesitate to correct me.

That's all, I think..now back to crashing rockets

OrionArm
Thanks ! Oh yes the 10 character lenght, I'll have to get use to it. Anyways thanks again
